attributes.action: Take swift and immediate action against the cheating group of students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Take swift and immediate action against the cheating group of students, who were blatantly cheating at the Music Quiz in the Old Beverley Pub in Canterbury on the 7th February 2008.
Furthermore we demand an apology to us, the Forgefields Massive, from both the cheating team, and the landlord, for the stress that the above has caused. It’s about time that establishments like the above are held accountably for their actions, and look the other way ethics.
We will be back to take part in the quiz on the 21st February. Where nobody will be spared…..NOBODY.

Forgefields Massive……FOR LIFE

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
